strapiPost.title: Local Springdale Cafe Wins Arkansas Food Hall Of Fame Award
strapiPost.content:
Arkansas Heritageâ€™s 6th annual Arkansas Food Hall of Fame ceremony was held a few days ago in Little Rock and a small, family restaurant in NWA walked away as a winner.

  • Home grown: Neal's Cafe of Springdale was 1 of 3 restaurants selected as the 2022 Food Hall of Fame winner. The other two winners included Colonial Steak House of Pine Bluff, and Dairy King of Portia.
  • Top tier: The Hall of Fame class of 2022 had 15 Finalists and three were inducted. In order to be eligible, restaurants must be owned and operated in Arkansas, cannot be part of a chain and must have been in business for 25 years or more. There were more than 400 nominations.

You can find a full list of winners and nominees HERE.
